img_text: #COMICSGATE ANTI-COMICSGATE ES And they call #ComicsGate"Anti-Diversity." They call us Bigots, Nazis, Racists, White Supremacists, Misogynists, Homophobic, a Hate Movement! All in order to Silence and Discredit us! In Actuality, we just want Good Stories with Good Art and Characters BEFORE Politics. Hiring based on MERIT, not IDENTITY Industry pros to treat Customers with Decency Not Distin and Hate. We ARE Diversity! We ARE #COMICSGATE
